articles.description: Fast bowler Josh Hazlewood admits that it is in Australia's "best interest" for England to be eliminated in the T20 World Cup group stage.

articles.description: Who will win, who might spring a surprise and how will England and Scotland do? BBC pundits predict what will happen at the 2024 European Championship.

articles.description: Tiger Woods says he has already "putted off many greens" in practice at the US Open, while defending champion Wyndham Clark says their pace is "borderline".
articles.title: US Open 2024: Tiger Woods says speed of Pinehurst greens will lead to 'war of attrition'

articles.description: Erik Ten Hag will remain as manager of Manchester United following a post-season review by the club's board.
articles.title: Erik Ten Hag: Manchester United manager to remain in charge of the club

articles.description: Scotland can "absolutely" surprise Germany in Friday's Euro 2024 opener, winger Lewis Morgan says.
articles.title: Euro 2024: 'Absolutely' - Morgan says Scotland can shock Germany

articles.description: Australia secure their place in the T20 World Cup Super 8s as they hammer Namibia by nine wickets with 14 overs to spare.
articles.title: T20 World Cup results: Australia bowl Namibia out for 72 to reach Super 8s

articles.description: Former Germany midfielder Thomas Hitzlsperger, who will be a BBC Sport pundit at Euro 2024, explains his tournament hopes.
articles.title: Thomas Hitzlsperger's Euro 2024 BBC Sport column: Germany is hoping for another summer fairytale

articles.description: BBC Sport heads to the New York Mets' Citi Life baseball stadium for a special India v Pakistan fan zone.
articles.title: T20 World Cup Video: India and Pakistan fans at New York Mets fan zone - BBC Sport
